2.1.2. Lab – Create the Access profile¶

In this section, you will create and define the setting of the access profile

2.1.2.1. Task – Create the Access Profile¶

  1. From the webbrowser, click on the Access tab located on the lefthand side.

  1. Navigate to Profile/ Policies >> Access Profile(Per-Session Policies), then click the + symbol to create a new Access Profile

  1. Enter the Name CERT_SSO
  2. Select the profile Type All from the dropdown

  1. Scroll to the bottom of the profile settings to set the default language to English
  2. Click Finished
